title: Bonus: 4 Lessons From Inside Jeff Bezos's Brain
description:
On a very special episode of Alex's other podcast The Founder's Journal, he talks about 4 timeless lessons from Jeff Bezos's 1997 letter to Amazon shareholders, which established the principles for building an e-commerce empire.
Click here for more info and more episodes of Founder's Journal
